description:
The investment seeks investment results that correspond to the price and yield performance of the Indxx India Infrastructure Index.
 Under normal circumstances, the fund will invest at least 80% of its net assets in Indian infrastructure companies included in the index and the advisor generally expects to be substantially invested at such times, with at least 95% of its net assets invested in these securities. The index is a maximum 30-stock free-float adjusted market capitalization-weighted index designed to measure the market performance of companies in the infrastructure industry in India. The fund is non-diversified.
